title: Ticket #6056: condor_advertise should send ads as it reads them
description:
currently condor_advertise buffers all of the ads it reads, and only when the input is closed does it begin sending ads to the collector. This makes it impossible to use for certain kinds of scale testing.

It should instead send each as soon as it finishes parsing it.
